title: New Product Consultation!
detail_text: <:th_ch0204/>Honoka-chan, thanks for the fruit daifuku the other day. It was very delicious!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Ehehe, I’m glad you liked it~! Hey hey, we at Homura are making a new fruit daifuku menu. Do you have any recommendations for it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Do you really want my opinion on it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Well, you seem to know a lot about current trends! I’d like to have something you don’t see much elsewhere, you know, as the main draw!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Something you don’t see much elsewhere.... huh? There’s a local island that specializes in passion fruit and lemon. I don’t think you see those very often, so how about those?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Mhmm. Passion fruit and lemon, alright....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>They might be hard to use on a fruit daifuku, though.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Ahaha, I’ll tell my mom that. Thanks for the advice, Karin-san! Here, take some of our manjuu as thanks!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>My, thank you, but I feel bad that I’m the only one benefitting from this. Let me buy some for Emma and the others as well.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Thank you very much~! I’ll give you some extra, okay!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
